Execution of suspicious command-line too.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 (Process Creation) for command-line arguments containing patterns associated with memory scraping or accessing `/proc` files. Use regex matching on command line arguments. Calculate frequency of suspicious command executions per host using descriptive statistics.

Unauthorized authentication attempts or.Data: Windows Event ID 4624, Windows Event ID 4625, Zeek kerberos.log, Zeek ssh.log
Unauthorized authentication attempts or.Action: Analyze Windows Event ID 4624/4625 (Logon/Logoff) and Zeek logs (kerberos.log, ssh.log) for successful logins following multiple failed attempts to the same service/account. Identify access from unusual source IPs or outside normal working hours using correlation analysis against historical login patterns. Flag accounts exhibiting high entropy in source IPs or access times.
